data.title: Hermann Hesse - The Glass Bead Game
data.meta_description: Hermann Hesse - The Glass Bead GameThe Glass Bead Game (German: Das Glasperlenspiel) is the last full-length novel of the German author Hermann Hesse. It was begun in 1931 and published in Switzerland in 1943 after being rejected for publication in Germany due to Hesse's anti-Fascist views. A few years later, in 1946,
